headline: McKesson Bets on Oncology, Biopharma as It Streamlines Portfolio
summary: MCK is transforming from a traditional distributor into a specialty-driven healthcare solutions leader, focusing on oncology, biopharma services and automation while preparing to separate its Medical-Surgical unit.

raw.headline: McKesson Bets on Oncology, Biopharma as It Streamlines Portfolio
